variables

    px-typography-design

    variables

    predix-font-family

    $predix-font-family: "GE Inspira Sans", sans-serif !default;

    Type

    String [default] - predix font-family

    inuit-webfont-path

    $inuit-webfont-path: '../px-typography-design/type' !default;

    Type

    String [default] - webfont path
